Articles.Content:
The tech is complete.

A massive, 150 thousand strong army of unimaginably advanced warships now begins its long, winding journey to the Krynn mothership.

No...I am NUAX!! **Charges Sampa, with the power to rip straight through his exoskeleton and unleash an army of T-Cells**

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T19:34:06Z" title="07/15/2015 07:34  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

(Shoots Xannari with modded phaser)

This has KSPI, so it's really OP!

> 
> Sampa, take my advice....

(Dude, this is not a romance novel)

> 
> (Dude, this is not a romance novel)

What? Oh.... Sorry, I've been posting in the wrong thread.
Dodges quickly but still refuses to fight...then gets an idea

> 
> *No**...* *I**am**Nuax**!* **Charges Sampa, with the power to rip straight through his exoskeleton and unleash an army of T-Cells**

Wait... Sampa has an exoskeleton? Me wants!

- - - Updated - - -

(Shoots Xannari again with modified phaser)

- - - Updated - - -

Xannari collapses

Krynn, you think that i am a meer human, i am more than that... 

\*Steps forward and places a hand on nuax/xannari's forhead entering into an automatic trance\*

> 
> Wait... Sampa has an exoskeleton? Me wants!
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> (Shoots Xannari again with modified phaser)
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Xannari collapses

[so we just end the story right there? Is that what you want?]

No, you were cured and knocked out.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Krynn, you think that i am a meer human, i am more than that... 
> \*Steps forward and places a hand on nuax/xannari's forhead entering into an automatic trance\*

Did is you visit the multiverse too?

Nuax....Reversed it is Xaun. Sound familiar?

Guys, she IS still in there somewhere!
(Upon entering the trance, it created a protective field around both parties...next events occur in nuax/xannari and my minds)

> 
> Krynn, you think that i am a meer human, i am more than that... 
> \*Steps forward and places a hand on nuax/xannari's forhead entering into an automatic trance\*

You think I am weak minded? **Begins to electrolytically charge the space around her**

Fi-h-!

Puts back the same amount of light energy, where are you xannari?

- - - Updated - - -

[On the astral plane:] \*sampa finally finds xannari's true mind being held captive by a dark essence\* xannari...
Nuax, we must resume course to gridmark 27. Do not be impaired by this puny life form.
[Astral plane:] krynn! Return my friend to me!
**Draws sword**
\*Advanced Fleet arrives and rends the Mothership to peices instantly, Sampa and Xannari float in space, exposed\*
\*Light energy blade forms\* en garde...

> 
> \*Advanced Fleet arrives and rends the Mothership to peices instantly, Sampa and Xannari float in space, exposed\*

[Cool concept. I'm in the middle of something here, though]
(Hey, i'm going to pause, gotta drive to my other house)

> 
> \*Light energy blade forms\* en garde...

You still resist, even in at an impasse. Your mind is strong, and will make a great addition to ourselves.

**Swings straight down at a 90 degree angle with sheer precision**

( ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â° ÃÅ“ÃŠâ€“ ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â°) The mothership got wiped out, the Krynn don't stand a chance anymore, yet you still clench a slim chance of continuing your crusade. How idiotic and desperate, indeed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T19:55:01Z" title="07/15/2015 07:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Souper**

> 
> ( ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â° ÃÅ“ÃŠâ€“ ÃÂ¡Ã‚Â°) The mothership got wiped out, the Krynn don't stand a chance anymore, yet you still clench a slim chance of continuing your crusade. How idiotic and desperate, indeed.

[Well because what you're doing makes no sense, not even theoretically]
[i'm sorry? I don't understand. My advanced technology destroyed your mothership, it makes perfect sense! An extremely advanced army is obviously OP.]
